mn65:27.1.pli: Idha, bhaddāli, ekacco bhikkhu saddhāmattakena vahati pemamattakena.
mn65:27.1.en: Take some other monk who gets by with mere faith and love.

mn65:27.3.pli: ‘ayaṁ kho, āvuso, bhikkhu saddhāmattakena vahati pemamattakena.
mn65:27.3.en: ‘Reverends, this monk gets by with mere faith and love.

mn65:28.3.pli: evameva kho, bhaddāli, idhekacco bhikkhu saddhāmattakena vahati pemamattakena.
mn65:28.3.en: In the same way, some monk gets by with mere faith and love.

mn65:28.5.pli: ‘ayaṁ kho, āvuso, bhikkhu saddhāmattakena vahati pemamattakena.
mn65:28.5.en: ‘Reverends, this monk gets by with mere faith and love.

mn100:7.5.pli: Santi pana, bhāradvāja, eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā kevalaṁ saddhāmattakena diṭṭhadhammābhiññāvosānapāramippattā, ādibrahmacariyaṁ paṭijānanti;
mn100:7.5.en: There are some ascetics and brahmins who solely by mere faith claim to have mastered the fundamentals of the spiritual life.

mn100:9.14.pli: ‘na kho āḷāro kālāmo imaṁ dhammaṁ kevalaṁ saddhāmattakena sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharāmīti pavedeti;
mn100:9.14.en: ‘It is not solely by mere faith that Āḷāra Kālāma declares: “I realize this teaching with my own insight, and live having achieved it.”

mn100:11.9.pli: ‘na kho rāmo imaṁ dhammaṁ kevalaṁ saddhāmattakena sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharāmīti pavedesi;
mn100:11.9.en: ‘It is not solely by mere faith that Rāma declared: “I realize this teaching with my own insight, and live having achieved it.”

mn36:13.10.pli: ‘na kho āḷāro kālāmo imaṁ dhammaṁ kevalaṁ saddhāmattakena sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharāmīti pavedeti,
mn36:13.10.en: ‘It is not solely by mere faith that Āḷāra Kālāma declares: “I realize this teaching with my own insight, and live having achieved it.”

mn36:15.9.pli: ‘na kho rāmo imaṁ dhammaṁ kevalaṁ saddhāmattakena sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharāmīti pavedesi.
mn36:15.9.en: ‘It is not solely by mere faith that Rāma declared: “I realize this teaching with my own insight, and live having achieved it.”

mlDocs.title:
Middle Discourses 36
The Longer Discourse With Saccaka

mn26:15.9.en: ‘It is not solely by mere faith that Āḷāra Kālāma declares: “I realize this teaching with my own insight, and live having achieved it.”

mn26:16.9.pli: ‘na kho rāmo imaṁ dhammaṁ kevalaṁ saddhāmattakena sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharāmīti pavedesi;
mn26:16.9.en: ‘It is not solely by mere faith that Rāma declared: “I realize this teaching with my own insight, and live having achieved it.”

mn85:11.10.pli: ‘na kho āḷāro kālāmo imaṁ dhammaṁ kevalaṁ saddhāmattakena sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharāmīti pavedeti;
mn85:11.10.en: ‘It is not solely by mere faith that Āḷāra Kālāma declares: “I realize this teaching with my own insight, and live having achieved it.”

mn85:12.35.pli: ‘na kho rāmo imaṁ dhammaṁ kevalaṁ saddhāmattakena sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharāmīti pavedesi;
mn85:12.35.en: ‘It is not solely by mere faith that Rāma declared: “I realize this teaching with my own insight, and live having achieved it.”

an6.55:11.2.en: ‘Maybe this venerable is dedicated to renunciation solely out of mere faith.’
